entries.title: Reuters reveals that India may peg gross borrowing under 16 trillion rupees in 2023/24
entries.description:
Reuters exclusively reported that India’s federal government is likely to keep its gross market borrowing below 16 trillion rupees ($196 billion) for […]

The post Reuters reveals that India may peg gross borrowing under 16 trillion rupees in 2023/24 appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
